name: Mario Party Challenge World
summary: Altered version of Mario Party Fushigi no Challenge World meant to be released in North America. Mario Party Challenge World was planned to be distributed by Raw Thrills in North America, being shown (in an early form) at IAAPA 2017. However, the American release would later be canceled, though several of the prototype units were still sold to various arcade locations. The "final" Raw Thrills version of the game was drastically different from the Japanese original, to the point where it is effectively a different game entirely (lacking the roulette wheel, a touchscreen, etc.).

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Mario Party Challenge World Prototype @ IAAPA2017 (Raw Thrills/Capcom/Nintendo)
